main event: A resident reported observing a glowing, round object in the sky near sunset on April 30, 1966, in Leesburg, Florida.
interesting points: The object was seen moving erratically before suddenly accelerating and disappearing from sight., Witness noticed the object while enjoying the sunset and described it as having a bright glow., The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 4 minutes., The witness ran to inform family members immediately after the sighting, but the object had vanished., The report expresses the uncertainty of the observer about the object's nature, suggesting the need for further research.
witness description: A resident named Patirson and family members.
